title: Vectors - truck distance with law of cosines

content.question: Two delivery trucks leave a distribution center at the same time and travel along straight roads that differ in direction by <math alttext="pi over 3"><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math> radians. One truck averages a speed of <math alttext="55"><mn>55</mn></math> miles per hour, and the other truck averages a speed of <math alttext="65"><mn>65</mn></math> miles per hour. To the nearest mile, how far apart, in a straight line, are the two trucks from each other after <math alttext="2"><mn>2</mn></math> hours?
